name: source/Component.js

params.name: template
params.description: HTML source or sub DOM tree

name: setAccessor
description:
Define a set of Getter or Setter for DOM properties,
and store their values into private object.

params.name: map
params.description:
`1` for Getter, `2` for Setter & sum for both
                      in each key's value

return.description: The index of `element` in its siblings
The target of `event` object (**Shadow DOM** is in account)

params.name: event
params.description: Event object which is created and only bubbles in the Shadow DOM

return.description: Default behavior of this event can be executed or not
Element set which matches `selector` in this Shadow DOM

name: source/utility/DOM-polyfill.js
source/utility/DOM.js

return.description: Whether current script is running in a sub DOM
Whether current script is in `<head />` of a DOM

name: source/utility/HTTP.js

return.description: Whether it's cross domain to current page

name: source/utility/object.js
multipleMap
description: Equivalent to the integration of Array's map() & filter() methods

params.name: filter
params.description: Return `item` itself to reserve, `undefined` or `null` to ignore, or Array to merge in.

name: extend
description:
Merge own properties of two or more objects together into the first object
by their descriptor

params.name: target
params.description:
An object that will receive the new properties
                            if `source` are passed in

params.name: source
params.description:
Additional objects containing properties to merge in
                            (Value of `null` or `undefined` will be skipped)

name: mapTree
description: Traverse Object-tree & return Node array through the filter

return.description:
`Null` or `Undefined` to **Skip the Sub-Tree**,
                   and Any other Type to Add into the Result Array.

name: source/view/ArrayView.js
source/view/ObjectView.js
watch
description: Add a watched property to this view instance

name: source/view/Template.js

params.name: varName
params.description: Name list of the Local variable

params.name: parameter
params.description: One or more value of the Local variable

name: ChangedCallback
description: Call back only on Value changed

name: source/view/View.js

params.name: nameKey
params.description:
Key (littleCamelCase) of HTML `data-*`
                                                    to get name of bound data

params.name: parent
params.description: Parent view in the DOM tree

return.description: This view or the view bound before
Full markup code of this view

name: parent
description: Parent view in current DOM tree

name: rootHost
description: Host element of a view in a Shadow DOM tree

name: valueOf
description: Get original data of this view

name: render
description: Render this view with data or Update without data

name: clear
description: Reset this view to empty data

name: source/WebCell.js
./ReadMe.markdown

content:
{
  "name": "web-cell",
  "version": "0.9.5",
  "description": "Light-weight Web Components engine based on ECMAScript 6+ with MVVM support",
  "keywords": [
    "WebApp",
    "Web-component",
    "SPA",
    "ECMAScript",
    "MVVM"
  ],
  "author": "shiy007@qq.com",
  "license": "LGPL-3.0",
  "browser": "dist/web-cell.js",
  "directories": {
    "lib": "source",
    "doc": "docs",
    "test": "test"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/EasyWebApp/WebCell.git"
  },
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/EasyWebApp/WebCell/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://web-cell.tk/",
  "engines": {
    "node": "^6.5.0"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "lint": "eslint --fix ./source/ ./test/",
    "pack": "amd-bundle source/WebCell dist/web-cell",
    "build": "npm run lint  &&  npm run pack  &&  esdoc",
    "start": "web-server docs/ -o",
    "test": "mocha --exit",
    "debug": "mocha --inspect-brk",
    "precommit": "npm test  &&  npm run build  &&  git add ."
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "amd-bundle": "^1.3.1",
    "babel-plugin-transform-runtime": "^6.23.0",
    "babel-polyfill": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-preset-env": "^1.7.0",
    "babel-register": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-runtime": "^6.26.0",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-external-webapi-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^4.19.1",
    "husky": "^0.14.3",
    "jsdom": "^11.12.0",
    "koapache": "^1.0.2",
    "mocha": "^5.2.0",
    "node-fetch": "^2.2.0",
    "puppeteer-browser": "^0.3.1",
    "should": "^13.2.3",
    "should-sinon": "0.0.6",
    "sinon": "^5.0.10",
    "whatwg-url": "^7.0.0"
  },
  "babel": {
    "presets": [
      "env"
    ],
    "plugins": [
      [
        "transform-runtime",
        {
          "polyfill": false
        }
      ],
      "transform-es2015-modules-commonjs"
    ]
  }
}
